00002 #ifndef __USB_SPEC_H
00003 #define __USB_SPEC_H
00004 
00005 #include "img_defs.h"
00006 
00007 #define USB_INI16(w) \
00008     { w & 0xff, (w >> 8) & 0xff }
00009 
00010 #define USB_INI32(dw) \
00011     { dw & 0xff, (dw >> 8) & 0xff, (dw >> 16) & 0xff, (dw >> 24) & 0xff }
00012 
00013 #define USB_LE16_TO_CPU(pc) (   (((IMG_UINT16)(*(pc+1)) & 0xFF) << 8) | (((IMG_UINT16)(*pc) & 0xFF)) )
00014 
00015 #define USB_CPU_TO_LE16(pc, val)  { *pc = (val & 0xff); *(pc + 1) = ((val >> 8) & 0xFF); }
00016 
00017 #define __ATTR_PACKED__         __attribute__ ((packed))
00018 
00019 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00020 
00021 /* CONTROL REQUEST QUANTITIES */
00022 
00023 /* USB directions used in endpoint descriptor bEndpointAddress field */
00024 #define USB_DIR_OUT                             0                       /* to device */
00025 #define USB_DIR_IN                              0x80            /* to host */
00026 
00027 /* USB types, the second of three bRequestType fields */
00028 #define USB_TYPE_MASK                   (0x03 << 5)
00029 #define USB_TYPE_STANDARD               (0x00 << 5)
00030 #define USB_TYPE_CLASS                  (0x01 << 5)
00031 #define USB_TYPE_VENDOR                 (0x02 << 5)
00032 #define USB_TYPE_RESERVED               (0x03 << 5)
00033 
00034 /* USB recipients, the third of three bRequestType fields */
00035 #define USB_RECIP_MASK                  0x1f
00036 #define USB_RECIP_DEVICE                0x00
00037 #define USB_RECIP_INTERFACE             0x01
00038 #define USB_RECIP_ENDPOINT              0x02
00039 #define USB_RECIP_OTHER                 0x03
00040 
00041 /* Standard requests, for the bRequest field of a SETUP packet */
00042 #define USB_REQ_GET_STATUS                      0x00
00043 #define USB_REQ_CLEAR_FEATURE           0x01
00044 #define USB_REQ_SET_FEATURE                     0x03
00045 #define USB_REQ_SET_ADDRESS                     0x05
00046 #define USB_REQ_GET_DESCRIPTOR          0x06
00047 #define USB_REQ_SET_DESCRIPTOR          0x07
00048 #define USB_REQ_GET_CONFIGURATION       0x08
00049 #define USB_REQ_SET_CONFIGURATION       0x09
00050 #define USB_REQ_GET_INTERFACE           0x0A
00051 #define USB_REQ_SET_INTERFACE           0x0B
00052 #define USB_REQ_SYNCH_FRAME                     0x0C
00053 
00054 /* USB feature flags */
00055 #define USB_DEVICE_SELF_POWERED                 0       /* (read only) */
00056 #define USB_DEVICE_REMOTE_WAKEUP                1       /* dev may initiate wakeup */
00057 #define USB_DEVICE_TEST_MODE                    2       /* (high speed only) */
00058 #define USB_DEVICE_B_HNP_ENABLE                 3       /* dev may initiate HNP */
00059 #define USB_DEVICE_A_HNP_SUPPORT                4       /* RH port supports HNP */
00060 #define USB_DEVICE_A_ALT_HNP_SUPPORT    5       /* other RH port does */
00061 #define USB_DEVICE_DEBUG_MODE                   6       /* (special devices only) */
00062 
00063 #define USB_ENDPOINT_HALT                               0       /* IN/OUT will STALL */
00064 
00065 
00066 /* USB_CTRLREQUEST - SETUP data for a USB device control request */
00067 typedef struct usb_ctrlrequest_t 
00068 {
00069         IMG_UINT8 bRequestType;
00070         IMG_UINT8 bRequest;
00071         IMG_UINT16 wValue;
00072         IMG_UINT16 wIndex;
00073         IMG_UINT16 wLength;
00074 
00075 } USB_CTRLREQUEST;
00076

00079 /* STANDARD DESCRIPTORS */
00080 
00081 /*  Descriptor types (USB 2.0 spec, table 9.5) */
00082 
00083 /* Descriptor codes */
00084 #define USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE        0x01
00085 #define USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE 0x02
00086 #define USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE        0x03
00087 #define USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE     0x04
00088 #define USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE      0x05
00089 
00090 
00091 #define USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE                              0x01
00092 #define USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE               0x02
00093 #define USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE                              0x03
00094 #define USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE                   0x04
00095 #define USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE                    0x05
00096 #define USB_DEVICE_QUALIFIER_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE    0x06
00097 #define USB_OTHER_SPEED_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE  0x07
00098 #define USB_INTERFACE_POWER_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE             0x08
00099 
00100 
00101 /* All standard descriptors have these 2 fields at the beginning */
00102 typedef struct usb_descriptor_header_t 
00103 {
00104         IMG_UINT8  bLength;
00105         IMG_UINT8  bDescriptorType;
00106 
00107 } USB_DESCRIPTOR_HEADER;
00108

00111 
00112 /* USB_DT_DEVICE: Device descriptor */
00113 typedef struct usb_device_descriptor_t 
00114 {
00115     IMG_UINT8 bLength;
00116     IMG_UINT8 bDescriptorType;
00117     IMG_UINT8 bcdUSB[2];
00118     IMG_UINT8 bDeviceClass;
00119     IMG_UINT8 bDeviceSubClass;
00120     IMG_UINT8 bDeviceProtocol;
00121     IMG_UINT8 bMaxPacketSize0;
00122     IMG_UINT8 idVendor[2];
00123     IMG_UINT8 idProduct[2];
00124     IMG_UINT8 bcdDevice[2];
00125     IMG_UINT8 iManufacturer;
00126     IMG_UINT8 iProduct;
00127     IMG_UINT8 iSerialNumber;
00128     IMG_UINT8 bNumConfigurations;
00129 
00130 }__ATTR_PACKED__ USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR;
00131 
00132 
00133 
00134 #define USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH 18
00135 
00136 
00137 /* Vendor specific class USB code */
00138 #define USB_CLASS_VENDOR_SPEC           0xff
00139

00142 /* USB_DT_CONFIG: Configuration descriptor information. */
00143 
00144 typedef struct usb_config_descriptor_t 
00145 {
00146         IMG_UINT8  bLength;
00147         IMG_UINT8  bDescriptorType;
00148 
00149         IMG_UINT8  wTotalLength[2]; 
00150         IMG_UINT8  bNumInterfaces;
00151         IMG_UINT8  bConfigurationValue;
00152         IMG_UINT8  iConfiguration;
00153         IMG_UINT8  bmAttributes;
00154         IMG_UINT8  bMaxPower;
00155 
00156 }__ATTR_PACKED__ USB_CONFIG_DESCRIPTOR;
00157 
00158 #define USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH 9
00159 
00160 /* from config descriptor bmAttributes */
00161 #define USB_CONFIG_ATT_ONE                      (1 << 7)        /* must be set */
00162 #define USB_CONFIG_ATT_SELFPOWER        (1 << 6)        /* self powered */
00163 #define USB_CONFIG_ATT_WAKEUP           (1 << 5)        /* can wakeup */
00164 
00165 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00166 
00167 /* USB_DT_INTERFACE: Interface descriptor */
00168 
00169 typedef struct usb_interface_descriptor_t 
00170 {
00171         IMG_UINT8  bLength;
00172         IMG_UINT8  bDescriptorType;
00173 
00174         IMG_UINT8  bInterfaceNumber;
00175         IMG_UINT8  bAlternateSetting;
00176         IMG_UINT8  bNumEndpoints;
00177         IMG_UINT8  bInterfaceClass;
00178         IMG_UINT8  bInterfaceSubClass;
00179         IMG_UINT8  bInterfaceProtocol;
00180         IMG_UINT8  iInterface;
00181 
00182 }__ATTR_PACKED__ USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR;
00183 
00184 #define USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH 9
00185 
00186 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00187 
00188 /* USB_DT_ENDPOINT: Endpoint descriptor */
00189 
00190 typedef struct usb_endpoint_descriptor_t 
00191 {
00192         IMG_UINT8  bLength;
00193         IMG_UINT8  bDescriptorType;
00194 
00195         IMG_UINT8  bEndpointAddress;
00196         IMG_UINT8  bmAttributes;
00197         IMG_UINT8  wMaxPacketSize[2];
00198         IMG_UINT8  bInterval;
00199 
00200 }__ATTR_PACKED__ USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR;
00201 
00202 #define USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH 7
00203

00205 /*
00206  * Endpoints
00207  */
00208 #define USB_ENDPOINT_NUMBER_MASK        0x0f    /* in bEndpointAddress */
00209 #define USB_ENDPOINT_DIR_MASK           0x80
00210 
00211 #define USB_ENDPOINT_XFERTYPE_MASK      0x03    /* in bmAttributes */
00212 #define USB_ENDPOINT_XFER_CONTROL       0
00213 #define USB_ENDPOINT_XFER_ISOC          1
00214 #define USB_ENDPOINT_XFER_BULK          2
00215 #define USB_ENDPOINT_XFER_INT           3

00221 
00222 typedef struct usb_qualifier_descriptor_t 
00223 {
00224         IMG_UINT8  bLength;
00225         IMG_UINT8  bDescriptorType;
00226 
00227         IMG_UINT8  bcdUSB[2];
00228         IMG_UINT8  bDeviceClass;

00231         IMG_UINT8  bMaxPacketSize0;
00232         IMG_UINT8  bNumConfigurations;
00233         IMG_UINT8  bRESERVED;
00234 
00235 }__ATTR_PACKED__ USB_QUALIFIER_DESCRIPTOR;
00236 
00237 #define USB_QUALIFIER_DESCRIPTOR_LENGTH         10

00241 typedef enum usb_device_speed 
00242 {
00243         USB_SPEED_UNKNOWN = 0,                          /* enumerating */
00244         USB_SPEED_LOW, 
00245         USB_SPEED_FULL,                                         /* usb 1.1 */
00246         USB_SPEED_HIGH                                          /* usb 2.0 */
00247 
00248 } USB_DEVICE_SPEED;
